<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add new keywords and messages to VA Adapters</description>
        <name>Add new keywords for Adapters</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var _page = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page");
_page.query();
while (_page.next()) {
	var client_type = _page.client_type;
	if (client_type == 'workplace')
		client_type = 'facebook';
	var configStr = new sn_cs_adapter.AdapterConfigGenerator().getDefaultConfigWithDescCategory(client_type);
	var defaultConfig = JSON.parse(configStr);

	var adapter_config = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration");
	adapter_config.addQuery("sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page", _page.sys_id);
	adapter_config.query();
	var adapter_config_dict=[];
	while (adapter_config.next()) {
	    if(client_type == 'slack' && adapter_config.attribute_name == 'carousel_next_msg')
			adapter_config.deleteRecord();

		adapter_config_dict.push({
			key:   adapter_config.attribute_name.trim(),
			value: adapter_config.attribute_value.trim(),
			sysId: adapter_config.getUniqueValue()
		});
	}

	//Start Of insert newly created record in sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page to sys_cs_adapter_configuration
	for( var akey in defaultConfig ){
		var isOldAttribute =false;
		for (var i = 0; i < adapter_config_dict.length; i++) {
			if(akey.equals(adapter_config_dict[i].key))
				{
				isOldAttribute=true;

				var oldAttribute = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration");
				oldAttribute.get(adapter_config_dict[i].sysId);
				oldAttribute.setValue('default_attribute_value', defaultConfig[akey].value);
				oldAttribute.setValue('description',defaultConfig[akey].description);
				oldAttribute.setValue('message_type',defaultConfig[akey].type);
				if(oldAttribute.attribute_name == 'unlink_account_confirmation_message')
					oldAttribute.setValue('attribute_name', 'unlink_account_confirmation_msg');
				oldAttribute.update();

				break;
			}
		}
		if(!isOldAttribute)
			{
			var newAttribute = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_adapter_configuration");
			newAttribute.initialize();
			newAttribute.setValue('sys_cs_adapter_configuration_page', _page.sys_id);
			newAttribute.setValue('attribute_name', akey);
			newAttribute.setValue('attribute_value', defaultConfig[akey].value);
			newAttribute.setValue('default_attribute_value', defaultConfig[akey].value);
			newAttribute.setValue('description',defaultConfig[akey].description);
			newAttribute.setValue('message_type',defaultConfig[akey].type);
			newAttribute.insert();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
